snippet: In the latest edition of T’s By the Numbers column, Jacob Z. Gross investigates the business behind one of the season’s most beloved traditions: holiday window displays. In the same spirit, we enlisted the photographer Natan Dvir to capture New...
lead_paragraph: In the latest edition of T’s By the Numbers column, Jacob Z. Gross investigates the business behind one of the season’s most beloved traditions: holiday window displays. In the same spirit, we enlisted the photographer Natan Dvir to capture New York City stores both before and after their seasonal transformations. On the images below, click and drag the sliders to watch the facades transition from their ordinary states into winter wonderlands.

headline.main: Watch New York City Landmarks Light Up for the Holidays
